tool.name: PAPAA: PanCancer map mutation class
tool.command: mkdir 'classifier' && ln -s '${scores}' 'classifier/classifier_decisions.tsv' && map_mutation_class.py --scores 'classifier' #if $path_genes and str($path_genes): --path_genes '$path_genes' #end if @INPUTS_COPY_NUMBER_FILE_CONDITIONAL@ @INPUT_FILENAME_RAW_MUT@ > '${log}'

param.label: string of the genes to extract or genelist file
param.name: path_genes

tool.help:
Pancancer_Aberrant_Pathway_Activity_Analysis scripts/map_mutation_class.py:
--scores String of the location of folder containing classifier_decisions.tsv --path_genes comma separated string of HUGO symbols for all genes in the pathway or Pathway genes list file --filename_copy_loss Filename of copy number loss --filename_copy_gain Filename of copy number gain --filename_raw_mut Filename of raw mut MAF
Output: - Merge per sample classifier scores with mutation types present in each sample and generate "mutation_classification_scores.tsv" file
